summary: Both REQ-68 and REQ-69 appear to be implemented. The diff shows SiteHeader and SiteFooter components are imported and rendered in both HomePage.tsx and AccountPage.tsx. The component summaries confirm the header is sticky with logo, Account link, phone number 9834587806, no admin link; and the footer displays phone 9834587806, email, services list, copyright, with GST line removed. All public-facing pages (/, /account) include both components wrapping the main content.
